member.name: T:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlSilverViewer
member.summary: RdlSilverViewer runs a report and provides visual access via a SilverLight control.

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlSilverViewer.GetXaml(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the XAML representation for the specified page. When null is returned; look at the Errors property for a list of the problems encountered rendering the report.
member.param: 1 for first page, 2 for second, and so on

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlSilverViewer.NoShow
member.summary: When true report won't be shown but parameters (if any) will be

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlSilverViewer.ReportFile
member.summary: Sets the report RDL file name.

member.name: P:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlSilverViewer.Errors
member.summary: List of errors encountered when rendering the report.

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.ImageHelper.SaveZipImage(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},fyiReporting.RDL.ZipOutputStream,fyiReporting.RDL.PageImage)
member.summary: SaveZipImage saves the bytes to a zip entry and returns the name. The passed cache is used to remember file names so that the same image isn't repeatedly saved.

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.ImageHelper.SaveImage(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Web.Caching.Cache)
member.summary: SaveImage saves the bytes to a file and returns the file name. The cache is used to remember the temporary file names and to timeout (and delete) the file.

member.name: F:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlListReports.Frame
member.summary: RdlListReports generates a list of reports available on the server

member.name: F:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.RdlReport.STATISTICS
member.summary: RdlReport generates an HTML report from a RDL file.

member.summary: When true report won't be shown but parameters (if any) will be

member.name: M:fyiReporting.RdlAsp.ReportHelper.GetParameterHtml(fyiReporting.RDL.Report,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the HTML needed to represent the parameters of a report.
